strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Great work this week, everyone! Let’s wrap up this Friday and get out there for some fun. 

  • It's in the game: An action-packed weekend of gaming, panels, celebrity events, and music begins tonight at the ReWired Fest. 
  • Digital DJ: Catch the last three nights of Momentous, the electronic music festival happening this weekend at the Momentary. 
  • Wish upon a star: Witness the Orinonid meteor shower over the Buffalo River during the Dark Sky Festival which starts today at 4p. 
  • Training wheels optional: Cheer kids on in OZ Kids Fat Tire Criterium and Fall Fest in Downtown Bentonville on Saturday at 3p. 
  • Howdy farmer: The first 180 shoppers to stop by the Downtown Bentonville Inc tent at the Bentonville Farmers Market will be gifted $10 in Market Cash. 
  • Happy doggone day: Celebrate National Make a Dog Day on Saturday in Downtown Rogers with a morning dog walk then “Barktoberfest” at City Pump Food Trucks at 4p.  
  • Talking trees: Hobbs State Park is hosting an interactive hike experience called Living Forest on Saturday from 1-4p 

Enjoy the weekend! We'll be back Monday.
